title: Rebel Wisdom Meetup DC, Sensemaking and Parallels with Pirsig, Alan Watts
description: Rebel Wisdom's David Fuller came to Washington, DC for a meetup. What a great time, and very interesting. In order to prep for this meetup, we watched a little of the Sensemaking convo and I see a lot of parallels with Pirsig's work. Also, thrilled to see Tim Lott discuss my first love Alan Watts.
